name: I Don't Want To Go
description:
First time I finished a game in Ren'Py, so it's extremely short, ~1700 words, for the No-Brainer IF Challenge. Based on my own personal experiences with social anxiety, so maybe I can "write in a genre you don't usually write in (non-fiction)" to the list of game jam challenges, alongside "3 or less art assets," "no gendered pronoun usage," and "at least 3 endings."

Pick your social poison and try to get all three endings.
